post.title: Join the Electron Developer Office Hour
post.description: Learn and ask your questions about ⚡️ Electron - the hugely popular open-source framework that powers...
post.body_html:
Learn and ask your questions about ⚡️ Electron - the hugely popular open-source framework that powers VS Code, Slack, Discord, and many other great desktop apps.

Get an intro on how to get started with Electron, our lessons learned, and bring your questions!

Electron is a hugely popular open source framework that enables the development of cross-platform desktop apps using web technologies.

If you have ever used Visual Studio Code, Slack, Discord, or an endless list of other great apps on macOS or Windows, you’ve used Electron.

We believe in creating a meaningful space for developers of all levels to learn, collaborate and catch up on the latest technologies and frameworks. We’ve created a dedicated block of time to make sure someone from our team can help answer questions and facilitate the conversations for our growing community.

The up and coming Developer Office Hour will be hosted by Brad Carter, Software Engineer at CoScreen and an Electron enthusiast.

Here’s the rough agenda:

  • Quick intro on Electron and how we use it at CoScreen to build our cross-platform collaboration app
  • Helping you to decide when it is the right technology for you and when it isn’t
  • And, of course, do our best to answer all of your questions.

The event will be hosted on June 3rd 2021 at 11 am PST / 2 pm EST.

Sign up and submit your questions here

Make sure to include your name and any useful information so we can help you best.

We are looking forward to chatting with all of you and learning together.

*not all questions will be answered, but we will do our best to :)

The CoScreen Team
post.body_markdown:
Learn and ask your questions about ⚡️ [Electron](https://www.electronjs.org/) - the hugely popular open-source framework that powers VS Code, Slack, Discord, and many other great desktop apps.

Get an intro on how to get started with Electron, our lessons learned, and bring your questions!

---

[Electron](https://www.electronjs.org/) is a hugely popular open source framework that enables the development of cross-platform desktop apps using web technologies. 

If you have ever used Visual Studio Code, Slack, Discord, or an endless list of other great apps on macOS or Windows, you’ve used Electron.

We believe in creating a meaningful space for developers of all levels to learn, collaborate and catch up on the latest technologies and frameworks. We’ve created a dedicated block of time to make sure someone from our team can help answer questions and facilitate the conversations for our growing community.

The up and coming Developer Office Hour will be hosted by Brad Carter, Software Engineer at [CoScreen](https://www.coscreen.co/) and an Electron enthusiast.

**Here’s the rough agenda:**
* Quick intro on Electron and how we use it at CoScreen to build our cross-platform collaboration app
* Helping you to decide when it is the right technology for you and when it isn’t
* And, of course, do our best to answer all of your questions.

The event will be hosted on **June 3rd 2021 at 11 am PST / 2 pm EST.**

Sign up and submit your questions [here] (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScrzguFPIWNWF34vXRpgfQsWeN5Qy3SWvcWIPBLVzgK3LI1jA/viewform?usp=sf_link)

Make sure to include your name and any useful information so we can help you best.

We are looking forward to chatting with all of you and learning together. 

*not all questions will be answered, but we will do our best to :)

The CoScreen Team
